page.title: 19MY HOUSE AT QUARRINGTON HILL
page.content: I live in Quarrington Hill. Our house is one of two council houses which have four bedrooms.Our bathroom is downstairs it has a toilet.There is a toilet upstairs it is only small. Our kitchen is quite small we have a washer,cooker and a refrigerator we have a lot of other electrical appliances too.In our living room we have a couch it is made from velvet, there are two chairs to match. We have a television and an old fashioned sideboard. Our house has a coal fire, it heats the water and the radiators. We have five radiators in our house. Upstairs we have four bedrooms. My bedroom is on the front of the house. We have a dining room downstairs it has got a table and chairs there. Our garden has lots of nice flowers my dad is making a wind break.
